name: Angular Kinematics
explanation: Angular kinematics describes rotational motion. Angular velocity (ω) changes with angular acceleration (α). Angular position (θ) relates to angular velocity and acceleration. Linear velocity equals radius times angular velocity (v = rω). Essential for analyzing rotating machinery, gears, motors, and any rotational system.

examples.problem: A wheel accelerates from rest at 2 rad/s² for 3 seconds. What is final angular velocity?
A point 0.5m from center rotates at 10 rad/s. What is linear velocity?
